name: Pie Crust
steps: Cut flour, salt, butter and shortening together with a pastery cutter. Blend in milk with a fork. Roll into a circle
and place in pie tin. Shape edges and "fork" crust. Bake at 425 for 10-­‐15 minutes if you are only baking the crust.
If you have filling, bake at 425 for 10-­‐15 minutes and then at 350 for 30-­‐45 minutes.
